attr.title: LISA: The Hopeful
attr.desc: Lisa The Hopeful is a fan game set in the Lisa universe. Go on another apocalyptic journey with a band of idiots looking to be the first to find the last living girl.
attr.desc_md: LISA: The Hopeful is a fan game set in the LISA universe. Go on another apocalyptic journey with a band of idiots looking to be the first to find the last living girl.
attr.inst:
download the game from itchio, https://taco-salad.itch.io/lisa-the-hopeful tested with Windows version. Copy all assetsto the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
attr.inst_md:
Download the game from [itch.io](https://taco-salad.itch.io/lisa-the-hopeful) (tested with Windows version). Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

**Note:** This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
